  • Constructor Details

    • Euchre

      public Euchre()
      Constructor that creates the 4 players and assigns them to teams.

  • Method Details

    • generateDeck

      public void generateDeck()
      Creates the necessary 24 cards for the game

    • distributeCards

      public void distributeCards()
      Gives 5 cards at random to each player. When a player recieves a card, it is removed from the deck of cards.

    • updateCurrentPlayerNum

      public int updateCurrentPlayerNum()
      Checks whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      The index of the current player.

    • toLeft

      public Player toLeft()
      Returns:
      The player to the left of the current player.

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      Changes the current player to whoever is to the left of the current player.

    • getDeck

      public ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
      Gets the ArrayList of card currently in the deck.
      Returns:
      The current state of the deck of cards.

    • rankCards

      public void rankCards()
      Assigns a rank to the cards that the players chose in the round based on the following rules: 1. Jack of trump 2. Jack of same color 3. Ace of trump 4. King of trump 5. Queen of trump 6. 10 of trump 7. 9 of trump 8. Anything else

    • getTrumpColor

      public String getTrumpColor()
      Gets the current color of the trump card to help determine the ranks of the cards in the deck.
      Returns:
      The color of the current trump card.

    • playRound

      public void playRound()
      PLays the round. Each player chooses a card to play and the ranks of those cards are compared to determine the winner.

    • setPlayedCard

      public void setPlayedCard(Card card, int index)
      Sets the card that a player has played for the current round.
      Parameters:
      card - The card the player wants to play.
      index - The index of the player card played.

    • getPlayedCard

      public Card getPlayedCard(int index)
      Gets the card that a player has played for the current round.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card played.
      Returns:
      The played Card at the index.

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      Finds the winner of the game by comparing the ranks of each of the player cards played.
      Returns:
      The player that won the round.

    • setTrump

      public void setTrump(String trump)
      Sets the current trump card.
      Parameters:
      trump - Set the value of the current trump card.

    • getTrump

      public String getTrump()
      Gets the current trump suit.
      Returns:
      The current value of the trump card.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(int playerNum)
      Gets the specified player object based on the parameter.
      Parameters:
      playerNum - The number of the player you would like to get.
      Returns:
      The player specified by the parameter.

    • getPlayerCard

      public Card getPlayerCard(int index, int playerNum)
      Gets a specific Card for a specific Player.
      Parameters:
      index - The number of the Card you would like to get.
      playerNum - The number of the Player you would like to get.
      Returns:
